roleset.name: speak negatively about
roleset.note: DENOUNCE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'denounce' based on sentences of financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. (from denounce.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Corporations like Contel denounce program trading...

example.name: with grounds
example.text: The opposition Labor Party leader, Neil Kinnock, in a display of the male chauvinism typical of the British lower class, denounced Mrs. Thatcher for having an independent mind and refusing to heed the men in her Cabinet.
example.arg: The opposition Labor Party leader, Neil Kinnock,
in a display of the male chauvinism typical of the British lower class
for having an independent mind and refusing to heed the men in her Cabinet
